subject: Tennis
lead_paragraph: The unseeded Radek Stepanek’s net-charging style carried him to the Legg Mason Tennis Classic title at 32, making him the tournament’s oldest champion since Jimmy Connors was 35 in 1988.
snippet: The unseeded Radek Stepanek’s net-charging style carried him to the Legg Mason Tennis Classic title at 32, making him the tournament’s oldest champion since Jimmy Connors was 35 in 1988.
